name: Sundae
description: Heavenly explosion of creamy vanilla ice cream, rich chocolate syrup, and delightful toppings with our irresistible sundae.

name: Waffle Cones
description: Waffle ice cream cone, featuring a crispy and golden waffle shell filled with creamy, dreamy ice cream and topped with a sprinkle of joy.

name: Three Scoops
description: Triple scoop delight featuring a heavenly trio of creamy vanilla, rich chocolate, and luscious strawberry flavors, all topped with a cascade of rainbow sprinkles and a cherry on top.

name: Coffee Shake
description: Smooth and creamy coffee-infused ice cream with a splash of velvety milk and a hint of sweet caramel, topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cocoa powder.
